title: 88/240/EEC: Commission Decision of 14 March 1988 approving the plan relating to the examination for hormone residues submitted by Portugal (Only the Portuguese text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 14 March 1988
approving the plan relating to the examination for hormone residues submitted by Portugal
(Only the Portuguese text is authentic)
(88/240/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The plan relating to the examination for residues of the substances referred to in Annex I, Groups A I and II, to Directive 86/469/EEC submitted by Portugal is hereby approved.
Portugall shall adopt the necessary laws, regulations and administrative provisions for the implementation of the plan referred to in Article 1.
This Decision is addressed to the Portuguese Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 14 March 1988.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 275, 26. 9. 1986, p. 36.
